short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the total duration of a YouTube playlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily determine the total duration of any YouTube playlist with this efficient extension. Whether you're assessing the length of your favorite playlists or planning your viewing sessions, the YouTube Playlist Duration Counter provides a seamless solution.

Features:

Instant Calculation: Quickly obtain the total duration of the currently open YouTube playlist with a single click. The duration is displayed in a clear, easy-to-read format (hours, minutes, seconds).

User-Friendly Interface: Benefit from a clean and intuitive interface designed to simplify the process of calculating playlist durations.

Eliminate the need for manual calculations and enhance your YouTube experience. Install the YouTube Playlist Duration Counter today to efficiently manage your viewing sessions.

Note: For playlists containing more than 100 videos, ensure all videos are loaded by scrolling through the entire playlist before using the extension.
